DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare recurrence-free survival duration survival patient stage III adenocarcinoma colon treat adjuvant high-dose fluorouracil without leucovorin calcium versus standard fluorouracil leucovorin calcium follow curative radical resection . - Compare safety regimens patient population . OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord regional lymph node involvement ( N1 ( 1-3 pericolic lymph node ) vs N2 ( 3 pericolic lymph node ) participate center . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive leucovorin calcium IV follow fluorouracil IV day 1-5 . Treatment repeat every 4 week 6 course . - Arm II : Patients receive high-dose fluorouracil IV continuously 48 hour weekly 8 week . Treatment repeat every 8 week 3 course . OR - Patients receive leucovorin calcium IV 2 hour follow fluorouracil IV continuously 24 hour weekly 6 week . Treatment repeat every 7 week 3 course . OR - Patients receive leucovorin calcium IV 2 hour follow fluorouracil IV bolus fluorouracil IV continuously 22 hour day 1 2 . Treatment repeat every 2 week 12 course . Patients follow 1 month , every 6 month 4.5 year , annually thereafter death . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 1,600 patient ( 800 per treatment arm ) accrue study within 3 year .
